entry.title: Combined summary - Bravo Charlie One: Branding Bech32
entry.summary: The author suggests a branding strategy to increase user familiarity and acceptance of the error-correcting, case-insensitive Bitcoin addresses of the future, specifically those based on BIP 173 Bech32 addresses. They propose using radio alphabets, such as "Bravo Charlie Addresses" as the official nickname for Bech32 Bitcoin use. The author believes that adopting a familiar phrase like this will raise user awareness of this new technology. In addition, the author invites discussion on recommendations for Bitcoin spelling-alphabet use in English and other languages to facilitate coherent user documentation. The branding only applies directly to Bitcoin Bech32 addresses, but the standard is generally adaptable and could be useful for other applications such as key fingerprints for PGP, SSH, and TLS.
